医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
简短的行为干预可减少 COVID-19 后医护人员对创伤的侵入性记忆研究人员正在研究认知任务是否可以减少在大流行期间遭受创伤经历的医护人员的侵入性记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Brief-behavioral-intervention-reduces-intrusive-memories-of-trauma-in-healthcare-workers-post-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Brief-behavioral-intervention-reduces-intrusive-memories-of-trauma-in-healthcare-workers-post-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e37f4e8c-cca7-48d0-ade4-2a3965c24c14 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 12:10:00 -0400 Brief behavioral intervention reduces intrusive memories of trauma in healthcare workers post-COVID-19
母亲肥胖使儿童患自闭症的风险增加一倍研究人员调查了母亲脂肪量与这些母亲所生孩子的长期心理健康问题之间的潜在关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Maternal-obesity-doubles-the-risk-of-developmenting-autism-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Maternal-obesity-doubles-the-risk-of-developmenting-autism-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dada3a3e-99ef-49fe-a736-deaa15c5ebc5 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 11:46:00 -0400 Maternal obesity doubles the risk of developing autism in children
2024 年世界肺日：Bedfont® Scientific Limited。 NObreath® FeNO 设备引领哮喘护理之路NICE 推荐的 NObreath® 装置如何在世界肺日彻底改变哮喘护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/World-Lung-Day-2024-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Leads-the-Way-in-Asthma-Care-with-the-NObreathc2ae-FeNO-设备.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/World-Lung-Day-2024-Bedfontc2ae-Scientific-Limited-Leads-the-Way-in-Asthma-Care-with-the-NObreathc2ae-FeNO- Device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=168c40cb-7341-4d49-b916-83884241ce88 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 11:05:00 -0400 World Lung Day 2024: Bedfont® Scientific Limited. Leads the Way in Asthma Care with the NObreath® FeNO Device
周末勇士锻炼可降低患 264 种疾病的风险由于忙于工作和其他义务，有些人将中等至剧烈的锻炼集中在一周或周末的一两天内。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Weekend-warrior-exercise-linked-with-lower-risk-of-developmenting-264-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Weekend-warrior-exercise-linked-with-lower-risk-of-developmenting-264-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54899848-a5e0-475f-a44b-7b6c84cb44d3 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 09:33:34 -0400 Weekend warrior exercise linked with lower risk of developing 264 diseases
爱尔兰孕妇缺铁率很高科克大学 (UCC) 的一项研究显示，爱尔兰五分之四的孕妇在妊娠晚期缺铁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/High-rate-of-iron-deficiency-among-pregnant-women-in-Ireland-revealed.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/High-rate-of-iron-deficiency-among-pregnant-women-in-Ireland-revealed.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=63237a0c-4b6f-4aad-adc1-43cc614c9dcd Thu, 26 Sep 2024 09:25:52 -0400 High rate of iron deficiency among pregnant women in Ireland revealed
UMC Utrecht 研究发现了 29 种针对肺炎克雷伯菌的新型抗体UMC Utrecht 的研究发现了 29 种针对肺炎克雷伯菌的新型抗体，肺炎克雷伯菌是耐药感染的重要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/UMC-Utrecht-study-uncovers-29-novel-antibodies-against-Klebsiella-pneumoniae.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/UMC-Utrecht-study-uncovers-29-novel-antibodies-against-Klebsiella-pneumoniae.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd02f25b-2ad0-4fd3-94da-4be7b6ed4ec5 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 08:36:41 -0400 UMC Utrecht study uncovers 29 novel antibodies against Klebsiella pneumoniae
新发现可能会改善与年龄和癌症相关的肌肉退化的治疗方法随着全球人口迅速老龄化，肌少症这种影响数百万老年人并严重降低其生活质量的疾病正在成为一个紧迫的公共卫生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/New-discovery-could-lead-to-improved-treatments-for-age-and-cancer-lated-muscle-degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/New-discovery-could-lead-to-improved-treatments-for-age-and-cancer-lated-muscle-degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a4b67daf-5db0-4126-b719-71f19766fcaa Thu, 26 Sep 2024 08:27:48 -0400 New discovery could lead to improved treatments for age- and cancer-related muscle degeneration
导致霍乱细菌如此危险的遗传因素被发现研究揭示了霍乱弧菌 O1 中驱动霍乱传播和严重程度的关键遗传因素，突出了新治疗策略的目标。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Genetic-factors-that-make-the-bacteria-behind-cholera-so-dangerous-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Genetic-factors-that-make-the-bacteria-behind-cholera-so-dangerous-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0bf7fa0d-8628-4dfa-a770-7229157dc11f Thu, 26 Sep 2024 07:49:00 -0400 Genetic factors that make the bacteria behind cholera so dangerous uncovered
护理助理在经历“噩梦”的新冠症状后深受创伤后应激障碍（PTSD）的困扰，但几乎没有帮助五月的一个晚上，护理助理黛布拉·拉古纳南 (Debra Ragoonanan) 在马萨诸塞州一所国营退伍军人之家值班时，视力模糊。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Nursing-aides-plagued-by-P​​TSD-after-e28098nightmaree28099-covid-conditions-with-little-help.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Nursing-aides-plagued-by-P​​TSD-after-e28098nightmaree28099-covid-conditions-with-little-help.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08e18509-8db5-46c6-8621-2af5d6f25625 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 07:27:00 -0400 Nursing aides plagued by PTSD after ‘nightmare’ covid conditions, with little help
靶向药物治疗有望缓解溃疡性结肠炎Cedars-Sinai 领导的一项国际安慰剂对照研究表明，Cedars-Sinai 研究人员开发的靶向药物疗法可以安全有效地帮助中度至重度溃疡性结肠炎患者达到临床缓解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Targeted-drug-therapy-shows-promise-for-ulcerative-colitis-remission.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240926/Targeted-drug-therapy-shows-promise-for-ulcerative-colitis-remission.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0ec6aa5-8a96-43ab-b384-aaaa3531f732 Thu, 26 Sep 2024 07:25:19 -0400 Targeted drug therapy shows promise for ulcerative colitis remission
